name: Cyrodiil
startIntroPart1: Tiber Septim of the Cyrodiilic Empire. You are a Dragonborn and the first Emperor of the Septim Empire. You are regarded as one of Tamriel's most famous figures, having been the only one in history to unite the continent. Starting with your service under the Cyrodilic emperor Cuhlecain, you fought under the name 'General Talos' to unify Cyrodiil, eventually succeeding or usurping Cuchlecain and becoming emperor. After your unification of Tamriel, an effort that culminated in the birth of the Third Empire, you ended the lengthy Interregnum and began the Third Era. You gave your name to the lineage of Cyrodiil Emperors, the Septims. Upon your death you became the deity Talos and took his place in the pantheon of the Nine Divines.
declaringWar: Surrender! You stand no chance against my might!
attacked: I pity your soldiers, they do not deserve to die from such a foolish decision!
uniques: [-20]% unhappiness from the number of cities

name: Summerset Isles
startIntroPart1: Ayrenn Arana Aldmeri, the High Queen of the Summerset Isles and the founder first iteration of the Aldmeri Dominion, one of the strongest alliances in history. Your life has held significance to the higher powers of Summerset, as your birth and times were foretold by the Scrolls of Praxis.
attacked: Pitiful fool! Now we shall destroy you!
introduction: I am the one destined to conquer the world! I am Ayrenn Arana Aldmeri!
tradeRequest: Accept or not, just make it quick!
uniques: No damage penalty for wounded units
